description:
**BRAND NEW & UP TO DATE 2016 - COMPLETE YOUTUBE COURSE!**

YouTube is an incredible platform that gives you the opportunity to market your business (or yourself!) to thousands of new customers everyday! There are over 1 billion active users every single month on YouTube! Learn the simple marketing funnel in this course and start increasing your revenue today.

YouTube is a simple & effective way to connect with new customers:

  • Create an attractive and powerful YouTube Channel
  • Identify, and create awesome content for your new Channel
  • Build strong trustworthy relationships with your YouTube viewers
  • Use the marketing funnel to convert viewers to paying customers


The YouTube Marketing Funnel has a huge financial return!

Once you spend a couple of hours learning the powerful YouTube marketing techniques in this course, it will pay off with reaching thousands of new customers, and building a strong trustworthy relationship with them. YouTube will skyrocket your brand awareness to a level beyond your expectations.

Once you learn this unique YouTube Marketing Funnel, you will have the power to create awesome content, attract thousands of viewers, convert these viewers to Email addresses, and instantly sell them a product.

YouTube Marketing Funnel Contents and Overview

This YouTube course contains over 50 lectures and 3 hours of content. It's designed for anyone from beginners, to advanced YouTube users to create a machine that pumps customers into your business.

In this course, you will learn the how to create a powerful YouTube Channel for your business (or yourself!) designed to effectively appeal your target customer.

You'll then learn, using the incredible YouTube promotional strategies, how to gain thousands of viewers, subscribers and leads for your business account every single day.

By the end of this course, you'll have valuable skills that will help you effectively build a strong community of YouTube subscribers, convert them to email addresses, and finally sell them your products and services (using our proven methods!)

You'll also receive practice activities, live demonstrations, and helpful resources to guide you through the entire process. From setting up your YouTube Channel, gathering a strong relevant following, to increasing the profit of your business with YouTube.

We are looking forward to seeing you on the inside ;)

- Benji & Charlie
title: YouTube Sales Funnel: Get 150,000 Subscribers and Profit
